text: Brian Stanley Mawhinney, Baron Mawhinney, PC (26 July 1940 – 9 November 2019) was a British Conservative Party politician. He was a member of the Cabinet of John Major from 1994 until 1997 and a Member of Parliament (MP) from 1979 until 2005. He was born in Belfast, Northern Ireland. Mawhinney died on 9 November 2019 in Peterborough, Cambridgeshire, aged 79. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:Knights Bachelor Category:UK MPs 1979–1983 Category:UK MPs 1983–1987 Category:UK MPs 1987–1992 Category:UK MPs 1992–1997 Category:UK MPs 1997–2001 Category:UK MPs 2001–2005 Category:Politicians from Belfast
title: Brian Mawhinney
